When Necrotic Savant enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if it has mana value 3 or less or if Necrotic Savant escaped.
Escape–{5}{B}{B}, Sacrifice two permanents, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
